growth-in-community.title: MayaData announces record growth in community adoption and revenues
growth-in-community.description: MayaData today announced mid-year 2020 results, including 419% growth in adoption of the CNCF project OpenEBS and the inclusion of the LitmusChaos project into the CNCF. Additionally, MayaData products including Kubera - with capabilities that include per workload back-ups - have delivered over 400% growth in sales during the first half of 2020 compared to the first half of 2019.
